grove.GroveJoystick.joyread: Detect position from Grove - Thumb Joystick
grove.PAJ7620.init: Create a new driver of Grove - Gesture
grove.PAJ7620.read: Detect and recognize the gestures from Grove - Gesture
grove.TM1637.bit: Show a single digit at specified bit of the Digit Display
grove.TM1637.clear: Turn off all segments the 4 digit display
grove.TM1637.point: Turn ON or OFF the colon of the 4 Digit Display
grove.TM1637.set: Set the brightness level of 4 digit display
grove.TM1637.show: Show a number on the 4 digit display
grove.createDisplay: Create a new Grove - 4-Digit Display driver at specified ports
grove.getGestureModel: Get the gesture sensor value, 0 refers to none detected, 1 - 9 represents 9 diffrent gestures
grove.getJoystick: Check if the joystick is being pressed or pushed to a specified direction and return as "Ture" or "False"
grove.ggesture: Check if a specified gesture is detected and return as "Ture" or "False"
grove.grove_loudnesssensor: Read the loudness sensor value from specified Grove port, the value is between 0 to 1023
grove.grove_minifanOnOff: Turn ON or OFF mini fan motor at specified Grove port
grove.grove_servo: Set the servo angle, the angle is between 0 to 180Â°
grove.grove_soundsensor: Read the sound sensor value from specified Grove port, the value is between 0 to 1023
grove.grove_ultrasonic: This block for micrGet the distance from Ultrasonic Sensor, the measuring range is between 2-350cm
grove.grove_ultrasonic_v2: (For micro:bit V2 ONLY)Get the distance from Grove-Ultrasonic Sensor, the measuring range is between 2-350cm
grove.onGesture: Do something when a specified gesture is detected
grove.onJoystick: Do something when the joystick is pushed to a specified direction
grove.setupWifi: Set up Grove - Uart WiFi V2 to connect to  Wi-Fi
grove.wifiOK: Check if Grove - Uart WiFi V2 is connected to Wifi
